name: Croda International - Cholesterol NF
description: Croda International offers Cholesterol NF, a powerful W/O emulsifier, moisturizer, and emollient for cosmetic formulations. Croda's cholesterol excels as both a primary W/O emulsifier and an O/W co-emulsifier and stabilizer. Ideal for creams, lotions, ointments, and absorption bases that require barrier repair and moisture retention properties.
